name: Master Thief
languages: any one language (usually Common) plus thieves' cant

abilities.name: Cunning Action.
abilities.description: On each of its turns, the thief can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

abilities.name: Evasion.
abilities.description: If the thief is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the thief instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.description: The thief deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the thief that isn't incapacitated and the thief doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.
